title: Didn't receive champion capsule after leveling up
body: Hello, 2 days ago i leveled up from lvl 48 to 49 and didn't receive any champion capsule.  I heard that i might get it later on but still it has passed almost 2 days and didn't get anything. Is that a bug, because i heard people on other servers had the same issue?

replies.body:
Hopefully these capsules will start getting added correctly again soon, but in the meantime the poro's got you fam! I could line up where you leveled up, and that you didn't get the capsule anywhere around that time, so it's added for you now ^_^! 

Be sure to refresh your client if you don't see it yet!
